channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Proto-Bento

item.title: Opening Our Doors
item.description: Welcome to our Kitchen Bento-Box is made up of a handful of nerds, but as we open up to the public, we want to make a promise to our users: to keep you updated on what we’re cooking up behind the scenes at Bento-Box without too much confusing tech jargon. Bento-Box is a small organization made up of students of Computer Science, and we’re already having tons of fun working on our projects together.
